Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement 3-agent LangGraph workflow system

Major architecture upgrade: Replace old graph-based workflow with new
3-agent adaptive tutoring system using LangGraph.

## New Components

### Workflow System (workflows/)
- TutorWorkflow: LangGraph orchestration with checkpointing
- SimplifiedState: Status-based navigation (no manual step tracking)
- Comprehensive helper functions and validation schemas

### Agent System (agents/)
- PLANNER: GPT-5.1 with deep reasoning for strategic planning
- EXECUTOR: GPT-4o for fast question generation
- EVALUATOR: GPT-4o for grading, feedback, and routing
- Base agent class with template method pattern

### Integration Layer (adapters/)
- SessionWorkflowAdapter: Bridges SessionService to TutorWorkflow
- StateAdapter: Converts between TutorState and SimplifiedState
- Maintains backward compatibility with existing API

### Services
- LLMService: Unified OpenAI API wrapper (GPT-4o, GPT-5.1)
- AgentLoggingService: Dual-format logging (JSONL + TXT)

### Logs API (api/routes/logs.py)
- Stream session logs in real-time
- Query agent execution history
- Machine and human-readable formats

## Key Features

âœ… Adaptive Teaching: Dynamic replanning when students struggle
âœ… Session Persistence: LangGraph checkpointing with SQLite
âœ… Comprehensive Logging: Full agent execution traces
âœ… Smart Routing: Context-aware entry prevents infinite loops
âœ… Cost Optimization: GPT-5.1 for planning only, GPT-4o for execution

## Modified Files

- SessionService: Now uses SessionWorkflowAdapter (not old GraphService)
- README: Updated architecture, added debugging/logs section
- main.py: Added logs router
- models/__init__.py: Added log schemas
- requirements.txt: Added langgraph-checkpoint-sqlite

## Documentation

Added comprehensive implementation docs in docs/features/tutor/:
- IMPLEMENTATION_PROGRESS.md: Complete progress tracking
- TUTOR_PLANNER_REQUIREMENTS.md: System design specs

## Status

Old workflow (graph/) still exists but is NOT used.
Will be removed in follow-up commit.
